CHAT.comment: COSTCO WHOLESALE CORPORATION, Petitioner v. OMEGA, S.A.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:02 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ROY T. ENGLERT, JR., ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF AARON M. PANNER ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MALCOLM L. STEWART, ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF ROY T. ENGLERT, JR., ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:00 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
